import { useRef } from "react"; import { Link, NavLink , Outlet } from "react-router-dom"; const RootLayout = () => { let menuSpans = useRef(); let nav = useRef(); let toggleMenu = () => { menuSpans.current.children[0].classList.toggle("top-span"); menuSpans.current.children[1].classList.toggle("middle-span"); menuSpans.current.children[2].classList.toggle("bottom-span"); nav.current.classList.toggle("toggle-nav") }; return (
